name: Alzh: Drawing Bones
description:
Alzh: Drawing Bones is a simple platform game.

On this occasion, you will have to figure out how to get out of these bizarre memories that Alzh is having.

In order to exit the level, you must find the key that will unlock the door. Beware of mysterious creatures that want you out of sight.

Good luck!

Source code --> https://github.com/melanchthon19/drawingBones
